stories.title: Indian Batting Greats
stories.description: Ranked Indian batting legends with an LLM-chosen metric: batting average x log(total runs), plotted across their active years.

stories.title: The Reconciliation Engine
stories.description: Fuzzy search playground that reconciles bank transactions to accounting records using similarity scores and optimal assignments.

stories.title: TDS Project 2: The Cliff
stories.description: Why only 29% of students mastered LLM problem-solving—and what the other 71% couldn't figure out - an analysis of 535 students at IIT Madras Tools in Data Science, November 2025

stories.title: Market Mix Modeling Insights
stories.description: Rather than wasting millions pushing past saturation points, invest in brand equity and pulsing spend during high-leverage moments.

stories.title: Michelin Star Restaurants
stories.description: An analysis of 22,000 Michelin star restaurants to uncover trends in cuisine, location and ratings.

stories.title: TDS Improvements
stories.description: An analysis of improvements in the IITM Tools in Data science course based on student performance data since 2024.

stories.title: Code Review of Shubham's GitHub
stories.description: A comprehensive review of all repositories committed to in 2025 under Shubham's GitHub account, analyzing code quality, architecture, and technical debt.

stories.title: The Publisher Who Chose to Shrink
stories.description: How Frontiers deliberately cut output by 36% to fight AI-generated fraud and won with quality. A counterintuitive victory in academic publishing.

stories.title: The Jobs We Refuse to Give Away
stories.description: Why some occupations resist AI not because machines can't do them, but because we believe they shouldn't. Based on Friis & Riley (2025).

stories.title: ISS vs Tokyo
stories.description: The ISS never passes over Tokyo at midnight UTC, but touches Auckland over 30 times over 321 days. No conspiracy. Just the timing.

stories.title: The Great Inversion
stories.description: Volume != Influence. Questions are liked less but engaged with more. And more insights from a Generative AI WhatsApp Group

stories.title: IMDb's Hidden Algorithm Bias
stories.description: New popular movies on IMDb are punished - not by the algorithm, but the casual movie watchers rating movies lower than devotees.

stories.title: India's Renewable Energy Revolution
stories.description: A narrative of REI Expo 2025 exhibitors: domestic players, solar dominance, and China collaboration.

stories.title: GDPVal: AI Augmentation
stories.description: Explore occupations most suitable for AI augmentation based on OpenAI's GDPVal exercise

stories.title: Rabbit Holes
stories.description: An interactive map of 3,560 browsing chains showing how sparks turn into deep dives across the web.

stories.title: Do Questions Find Answers?
stories.description: Search journeys from query to first click, with filters that expose instant wins and wandering quests.

stories.title: Your Attention Clock
stories.description: Heatmaps of weekly browsing reveal circadian focus, daily ebbs, and the domains that anchor attention.

stories.title: The Digital Life of Anand
stories.description: An exposé of 97k visits across 84 days that charts top destinations, hourly habits, and AI-heavy searches.

stories.title: Scraping SEC
stories.description: Narrative walkthrough of how Codex CLI built an SEC scraper in one-shot, recovering from errors, handling messy data, and with self-critique.

stories.title: Bollywood Box Office Champions
stories.description: Interactive, inflation-adjusted bubble chart of the top-grossing Hindi films from 1994 to 2024, spotlighting record-setting blockbusters.

stories.title: Google Search Topic Trends
stories.description: Categorized every Google Search since Jan 2021 into 50 topics. It's mostly tech, AI, and geo-cultural. I also need to allocate more time to testing, databases, and other 'spiky' topics.

stories.title: ChatGPT vs Google
stories.description: How my ChatGPT usage has grown at the expense of Google usage. Google is only 60% of my usage, and far lower in engagement

stories.title: My Vipassana Experience
stories.description: A manually LLM-generated comic story book about my 10-day Vipassana meditation program, generated purely using a set of simple captions, via ChatGPT

stories.title: My Vipassana Experience
stories.description: A programmatically LLM-generated comic story book about my 10-day Vipassana meditation program, generated purely using a set of simple captions, via Gemini 2.0 Flash

stories.title: ChatGPT Topic Trends
stories.description: Categorized the 6,000 ChatGPT conversations I've had in the last 2 years to understand what topics I discuss the most. It's mostly tech, AI, reading/writing, and some daily-life stuff.

stories.title: Indian High Courts Judgment Analysis
stories.description: Comprehensive analysis of 16M judgments from 25 Indian High Courts. Reveals court efficiency disparities, seasonal justice patterns, and systematic UAPA bail delays with 120+ day gaps between hearings.

stories.title: LLM Agents in Software: Code vs Domain
stories.description: Coding agents reduce the effort of coding. Does that mean domain will matter more? Here's an LLM-generated animation showing my perspective that domain agents will level the field.

stories.title: Deep Research Horoscope Contradictions
stories.description: Asked Gemini Deep Research to read Sagittarius horoscope for 16 June 2025 and list contradictions from various Indian media sources.

stories.title: Employment Growth Since 1980
stories.description: Some US sectors like Scenic Transportation & Healthcare grew over 2X while Rail & Central Banks shrank to 40-80% of original size. Analysis using BLS CES data.

stories.title: Weight Journey 2025
stories.description: Lost 22 kg in 22 weeks through intermittent fasting. Skipped lunch, no snacks, no extra exercise.
